mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RECRUIT(RC_ID, RC_DEPID, RC_POSID, RC_NUMBER, RC_SALARY, RC_TIME, RC_DESCRIPTION, RC_STATE, RC_REQUIREMENT) VALUES (T_RECRUIT_SEQ.nextval,#{department.id},#{position.id},#{number},#{salary},#{time},#{description},#{state},#{requirement})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RECRUIT SET RC_STATE=#{state} where RC_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_RECRUIT rc,T_DEPARTMENT dep,T_POSITION pos where rc.RC_DEPID=dep.DEP_ID AND rc.RC_POSID=pos.POS_ID AND rc.RC_STATE=#{state}
SELECT * FROM T_RECRUIT rc,T_DEPARTMENT dep,T_POSITION pos where rc.RC_DEPID=dep.DEP_ID AND rc.RC_POSID=pos.POS_ID AND rc.RC_ID=#{id}
